data.name: Llanthmar
data.detailed_description:
After crashing and being scattered across an unknown planet, the crew and passengers of The Llanthmar must start a new home for themselves in a strange new world. As the commander of a small expedition team, you are tasked with setting up a settlement for the remaining survivors.

Establish a colony, find other survivors and invite them to join you, encounter and interact with native species and potential intelligent life. Lead your colony into a new age as they work to build a new home for humanity, just be careful as there will be many dangers along the way. Not everyone on board The Llanthmar was a friend and you are not the only team that was sent out.

FEATURES
-Characters have skills and attributes that grow based on how you use them
-Character perma-death
-Build structures and claim territory
-Control a single character or a massive army and everything in between, each grouping having their own special abilities and uses
-Grow and harvest food to ensure the survival of your colony
-Gather wood, ores, and other resources from the nearby environment to supply your colony with all the materials it needs to build and grow
-Set up supply lines make sure your resources are where they need to be when they are needed
-"Living" forests that could overgrow unused paths or die off from overharvesting and other means
-Hundreds of skills and abilities

data.short_description: Llanthmar is a turn-based, strategy game that tasks you with ensuring the survival of your lost colony on an unknown planet. Gather resources, manufacture supplies, and fight back against anything that threatens to take them away.
